name: Ping-Pong!
description: I am back with another game project! Ping-Pong, It is just like the old arcade game... Good times. First to get 7 points wins and the 'AI' is very hard to beat, So goodluck. I have tried my best with turning pong, an arcade game into a mobile game with touch controls. The Mobile Game is hard to control i believe, So if you beat it. You are a PRO GAMER.  The only real problem you have to winning is the 'AI'
